title: Borgia S01 Genuine Blu-ray Rip 720p HEVC 10-Bit EN SRT AAC
description:
Created by a special request, this is a 720 BD Rip with stereo sound. Made to be as small as possible yet maintain great 720p video.

This is the entire season one, replacing my earlier torrents of each episode. Seasons 2 and 3 are also available.

I used x265 in a multipass "slow" 10 bit HEVC encode at an average bitrate of 600kbps. The audio is a simple compact stereo 128kbps AAC.

Finally, the English subtitles are included.

I think x265 has done a pretty good job with the low bandwidth I granted it. Please share, comment, flame or enjoy.

Video Codec h265 10 Bit LE
Resolution1280 x 720
Mode Progressive
Aspect Ratio 16:9
Framerate 23.976
Average Bitrate 600kbps
Max Bitrate 2000kbps
Pixel Format 4:2:0

Audio AAC
Channels 2
Bitrate 128kbps

Subtitles SRT English
